meanings.definition: A radiographic examination of the bile ducts using a contrast medium.
meanings.sent1: The doctor studied the cholangiograms to understand the patient's condition.
meanings.sent2: The cholangiograms helped identify blockages in the bile ducts.
meanings.sent3: The cholangiograms looked like a colorful map of the body's rivers.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a collection of cholangiograms, each revealing a different aspect of her thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The cholangiograms glowed on the screen, revealing the inner workings of the body.

meanings.definition: The resulting image produced by a cholangiogram.
meanings.sent1: The cholangiograms displayed a clear view of the bile ducts.
meanings.sent2: She marveled at the intricate details captured in the cholangiograms.
meanings.sent3: The cholangiograms seemed to dance on the screen, creating a mesmerizing pattern.
meanings.sent4: His memories were like cholangiograms, each one a snapshot of a moment in time.
meanings.sent5: The cholangiograms revealed a hidden world within the body, like a secret map waiting to be explored.
